description:
Codeforces is an online judge serving 1000s of competitive programming problems.

Checks are few! Most of the location requirements are within your brain :)

codeforces-v0.0.1.description:
Initialising the project with a working APWorld and Client.

Please see documentation files for setup guide.
codeforces-v0.0.1.title: Codeforces v0.0.1 - Alpha Release

codeforces-v0.0.2.description: Fixes an issue where the apworld does not correctly package third-party dependency cloudscraper into the .apworld.
codeforces-v0.0.2.title: Codeforces v0.0.2 - Fix for dependencies

codeforces-v0.0.3.description:
Changes:
* Various fixes related to API Issues:
  - Can now play without api token
  - Now get more useful errors with invalid input
  - Rate limit issues now have a special error message
* New: Specify your codeforces handle at generation to remove solved problems from the pool

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/glipR/Archipelago/compare/codeforces-v0.0.2...codeforces-v0.0.3
codeforces-v0.0.3.title: Codeforces v0.0.3 - API Fixes + Exclusion Feature
